item.description:
A few hardy souls will be camping at Tolland State Forest in Massachusetts this weekend. Three of us have already reserved campsites -- if you would like to camp, please go to www.reserveamerica.com and reserve a site ASAP. Suggested sites to put you close to the rest of the group are 77, 84, or 41. Some of us are camping both Friday and Saturday evenings, but if you only want to come for one evening, we suggest Saturday.

For those who don?t want to camp, plan to join us in the day use area on Sunday at noon and bring something to share for a potluck picnic brunch. Plan on water activities, as we hope the Hoerman?s will have their boat there! Directions from I-90 or Route 8 are available on the park web site. Things to know ? leashed dogs are allowed in the park but not on the beach and NO alcohol is permitted in the park.

Campsite Reservations

Park website for directions and such
item.name: Camping trip
